sub_title: Online Communications Officer at NIMD | Netherlands Institute for Multiparty Democracy
summary: International communicator and translator in the field of international development. Excellent spoken and written English, with proven writing, editing and proofreading skills. Full professional proficiency in French and Spanish. In-depth knowledge of the conventions and functions of different text types. Strong experience of managing social media for advocacy and development.
